nodes.text: Fumo was a human male soldier for the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance and the Galactic Empire, he fought Imperial troops on the moon Jedha.
Fumo was a human male who joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic sometime during or before the year 0 BBY.
Fumo was a human with brown eyes and light skin.
Fumo wore the fatigues of a Rebel trooper.
Fumo was created as a playable character for the online browser video game Star Wars: Boots on the Ground. Players could select Fumo to be a member of their three-man rebel squad.
